definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Am 9:1 escaped one, fugitive;—´[[פ]] abs. 2Ki 9:15 +; pl. cstr. [[פְּלִיטֵי]] Ju Jdg 12:4 + ; sf. [[פְּלִיטָיו]] Ob:Ob 14, etc.;—Am 9:1, 2Ki 9:15, Ge 14:13, Ez Eze 24:26, Eze 24:27, Eze 33:21 ( + [[מִן]] loc.), v:Eze 33:22; ´[[שָׂרִיד וּפ]] Jos 8:22, Je 42:17; [[וְשָׂרִיד]] ´[[פ]] 44:14, La 2:22; c. genit. subj. Ju Jdg 12:5 fugitives of Ephr. (del. in v:Jdg 12:4, see GFM), so c. sf. Ez Eze 6:9, Eze 7:16, Ob:Ob 14; c. genit. obj., escaped of, i.e. from Is 45:20, so [[פְּלִיטֵי חֶרֶב]] Je 44:28, Ez Eze 6:8.
